document_title: Lupus nephritis: Causes, symptoms, diagnosis, prevention
subsection_name: viem-than-lupus.json_8_Preventing and controlling lupus kidney disease
subsection_content:
Given the dangerous complications above, preventing and controlling lupus nephritis is extremely important. We need to have a healthy lifestyle and activities such as:
Drink enough water every day, about 1.5 - 2l.; Healthy diet: Make sure to add enough nutrients to your menu every day. Limit intake of sodium-rich foods for people with high blood pressure; Limit alcohol, beer and smoking; Limit intake of foods high in cholesterol; Regularly exercise with appropriate intensity; Do not take medication without consulting your doctor.
